statements: SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_metrics;
SELECT id, record_date, total_attacks FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE successful_attacks > 10;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE failed_attacks IS NULL;
SELECT id, total_attacks, vulnerability_score FROM cybersecurity_metrics ORDER BY vulnerability_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE malware_detected = TRUE AND vulnerability_score <= 7.5;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE total_attacks > 100 AND vulnerability_score > 7.5 ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT id, record_date, successful_attacks FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE malware_detected = True AND failed_attacks < 5 ORDER BY successful_attacks DESC;
SELECT AVG(total_attacks) AS average_attacks, SUM(successful_attacks) AS total_successful_attacks FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE vulnerability_score < 5;
SELECT id, record_date, total_attacks, vulnerability_score FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE total_attacks BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT AVG(vulnerability_score) AS avg_vulnerability, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE malware_detected = False;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_category, trend_description FROM cybersecurity_trends WHERE trend_status = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) as avg_value FROM cybersecurity_metrics;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT trend_id, trend_category, trend_date FROM cybersecurity_trends WHERE trend_category = 'Data Protection';
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, trend_description FROM cybersecurity_trends WHERE trend_status = TRUE ORDER BY trend_date;
SELECT metric_name, ROUND(metric_value, 2) AS rounded_value FROM cybersecurity_metrics WHERE metric_value < 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Metrics;
SELECT Metric_Name, Metric_Value FROM Metrics ORDER BY Metric_Value DESC;
SELECT Metric_Name, Metric_Value FROM Metrics WHERE Metric_Value > 100;
SELECT Trend_Name, Trend_Description FROM Trends WHERE Start_Date >= '2022-01-01' AND End_Date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT Record_Date, Record_Value FROM Records WHERE Record_Value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY Record_Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Metrics WHERE Metric_Value > 100 ORDER BY Metric_Value DESC, Timestamp DESC;
SELECT Record_ID, Metric_Name, Record_Date FROM Records INNER JOIN Metrics ON Records.Metric_ID = Metrics.ID WHERE Record_Value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY Record_Date ASC;
SELECT Trend_Name, COUNT(*) FROM Trends GROUP BY Trend_Name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Records WHERE Record_Value < 50 AND Record_Date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY Record_Date DESC;
SELECT Metric_Name, SUM(Metric_Value) AS Total_Value FROM Metrics GROUP BY Metric_Name HAVING Total_Value > 500 ORDER BY Total_Value DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT id, email, role FROM users WHERE id<=5;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT attack_type, attack_date FROM attacks WHERE attack_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT attack_type, attack_date FROM attacks WHERE attack_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM login_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT activity_type, user_id, activity_time FROM activities WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, user_id, alert_time FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM activities WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM login_logs WHERE login_time > '2022-01-01' AND logout_time < '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, alert_type, alert_time FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY alert_time ASC
